Class Settings

  • java.lang.Object
    • sample.Settings

  • public class Settings
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the class used for Settings. The Default Settings are - Difficulty = "Easy" and Colour = "Gold"

    • Constructor Detail

      • Settings

        public Settings(Main m)
        This is the constructor of the Settings. The Settings are displayed on an Anchor Pane. Here the Settings that can be chosen are - Difficulty, Colour of Snake and Number of Players.
        Parameters:
        m - It is an instance of the Main Class

    • Method Detail

      • setDifficulty

        public void setDifficulty(java.lang.String difficulty)
        Parameters:
